title: IDerivedPatternFeatureData.PropagateVisualProperty
description: Gets or sets whether to propagate visual properties (e.g., colors, textures, etc.) in this derived pattern feature.
returns: True to propagate visual properties, false to not
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
